contentrichtext.text: {{unreferenced|date=November 2009}} {{notability|date=November 2009}} '''Zipper Spy''' is a project by the American multimedia artist Maria Moran which incorporates a variety of sound and visual sources, especially zippers. She was married to [[Emil Beaulieau]], an American noise artist. ==Discography== *''Watch Your Damage'' (CD) (Vinyl Communications 1997) *''Living In A Free World?'' (12") (Stichting Mixer 1999) *''Extortionist'' (12") (The Homewrecker Foundation 1999) *''Icki Beats'' (CD) (Ground Fault Recordings 1999) *''Japan 2000'' (CDr) ([[RRRecords]] 2000) *''Untitled'' (2x12") (K.Ktus Tribe Record 2000) *''Untitled'' (12") (K.Ktus Tribe Record 2001) {{US-musician-stub}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Zipper Spy}} [[Category:American experimental musical groups]]
